column4: hey, I'm having some trouble connecting to my windows computer. Can anyone help?
I can't connect to my windows computer on any level, RDP,  PING... nothing
the windows machine is up and online
lol, gj
anyone have any ideas why I can't even ping the windows machine?
jeez, I can't even connect to my router
no route to host
how am I even online if that's the case?
it would be better if you can check to see if win32 box is connected to network (ipconfig in cmd)
it's on the network
can win32 ping your ubuntu box?
hm. okay. router is doing something with local networking.
if you cannot access the router, then it might be a good idea to reset it. (i have done it before)
can you access the router by wired, not wireless?
good idea, dude :)
good. check out all options and see if all boxes can talk to each other.
well. it could be anything. you'll have to play with it 'til all machines can talk to each other.
I don't even know where to start
can you ping win32 box now?
ah! then try RDP
ok. you'll need to find out why on the router. linksys or d-link?
i could do it on wireless with linksys. i didn't do anything special on the router. why don't you check the security page | wireless tab
